{"id":931740469,"question_id":2670,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681196562,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"135 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/931740469/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make K-Subarray Sums Equal","memory":"62.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long makeSubKSumEqual(int[] arr, int k) {\n        long res = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < k; ++i) {\n            List<Integer> cycle = new ArrayList<>();\n            for (int j = i; arr[j] != 0; j = (j + k) % arr.length) {\n                cycle.add(arr[j]);\n                arr[j] = 0;\n            }\n            Collections.sort(cycle);\n            for (int n : cycle)\n                res += Math.abs(n - cycle.get(cycle.size() / 2));\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-k-subarray-sums-equal","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
